name: Golem Arcana
summary: Golem Arcana offers a whole new way to play tabletop games by harnessing the power of your smartphone or tablet. As you play, the app serves as a sort of referee and rulebook, freeing up the players to concentrate on devising strategies to crush their enemies and give grief to their friends on the other side of the table. Thus, Golem Arcana combines the tactile fun of a tabletop game with the accessibility of an online game. It’s the best of both worlds, offering up a unique experience that neither could deliver on its own.
